name: The Witch's Lair
description:
The Witch’s Lair is a fast-paced first-person parkour game set in a magical environment.

  • Find your way through the enchanted chambers
  • Master the mechanics to optimise your time
  • Show off your skills in finding the perfect route

The Witch's Lair is a final year bachelor project created by six art, programming and audio students. The game contains four different levels to master. Every level has its own unique theme, as well as an online scoreboard which shows the best records.

For further insides and updates, follow us on Twitter and Instagram.

We will see you on the scoreboard!
